title: Save nearly $10 on The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD
author: tabitha-baker
summary: An early discount for a best-seller
article: While we're only two weeks into the life cycle of The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword, we're already seeing an early discount at Best Buy. You'll find the latest port to hit the Nintendo Switch for just $50.99 right now (was $59.99), an excellent saving considering this is such a recent release.

While a small saving, seeing any early discounts on a Nintendo release of this scale is surprising, especially considering it's already the second best selling game on Amazon this year. That's an impressive leap to the top, which makes Best Buy's discount all the more exciting.

Of course, as a port it was likely that we would be seeing Nintendo Switch game deals hitting this title sooner rather than later. However, considering the game's skyrocketing success we would have expected a few more weeks at full price here. We only saw Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury taking a similar discount a month after release (though you can still find it for $10 off at Amazon, now $49.99).
